document_data.name: Vegetable Broth
document_data.mainbody: '''Vegetable broth''' was one of the simplest soups available in the realms and often used as a base for other dishes.
document_data.Description: Vegetable broth was a richly flavored soup of slowly simmered vegetables over the course of several hours. In the [[Western Heartlands]], it was served with a piece of mushy [[tofu]] floating in the bowl.
document_data.Availability:
In the late-14{{th}} century [[DR]], vegetable broth was a common food across the Western Heartlands and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]].

In [[Stargath House]] inn of [[Purskul]], spicy vegetable broth was served with [[mussel]]s as one of the establishment's staples.
